## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pmstack">PMStack</a> - This class implements a stack data structure of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pmdatamanager">PMDataManager</a> pointers.

Top level pass managers (see PassManager.cpp) maintain active <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> Managers using <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pmstack">PMStack</a>. Each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> implements assignPassManager() to connect itself with appropriate manager. assignPassManager() walks <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pmstack">PMStack</a> to find suitable manager.

Definition at line 136 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanagers-h">LegacyPassManagers.h</a>.
